vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
STOStorage.endTime should be constant (STOStorage.sol#18)
STOStorage.investorCount should be constant (STOStorage.sol#22)
STOStorage.isFinalized should be constant (STOStorage.sol#30)
STOStorage.pausedTime should be constant (STOStorage.sol#20)
STOStorage.preMintAllowed should be constant (STOStorage.sol#28)
STOStorage.startTime should be constant (STOStorage.sol#16)
STOStorage.totalTokensSold should be constant (STOStorage.sol#26)
STOStorage.treasuryWallet should be constant (STOStorage.sol#32)
STOStorage.wallet should be constant (STOStorage.sol#24)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
